chapter.title: Local Preview
chapter.para: This chapter is about the local preview in &app;. It is useful to give you an idea of what you will send to a remote peer before to actually start the streaming session.

sect1.title: Starting and stopping the preview
sect1.para: Click on the "Preview" button to start it. Press again to stop it. If you start a streaming session, it will automatically be closed.
The preview consists in a window that can be either separate or embedded in the &app; window. &app; will also display the audio levels for your local audio input.
